nodes.description: 阿富汗上周举行全国和解会议，支持与塔利班和平谈判计划
nodes.support_text: Last week, Afghanistan held a national peace council and endorsed a plan to seek peace with the Taliban.

nodes.description: 上周一北约在阿富汗阵亡10名士兵，创数月最严重单日伤亡
nodes.support_text: On Monday, Nato's International Security Assistance Force (Isaf) lost 10 soldiers on its deadliest day in months.

nodes.description: 周三早些时候四名北约士兵在赫尔曼德省直升机遭火箭弹击落
nodes.support_text: In earlier violence on Wednesday, four American Nato soldiers were killed when their helicopter was shot down in neighbouring Helmand province.

nodes.description: 周三晚坎大哈省婚礼地点发生爆炸，造成39人死亡73人受伤
nodes.support_text: An explosion in Kandahar province... killed at least 39 people... the blast ripped through a wedding party on Wednesday evening, leaving another 70 more wounded.

nodes.description: 爆炸现场确认发生在男性区域，新郎及亲友均受伤
nodes.support_text: The explosion was reported to have taken place in an area reserved for men. The groom was one of those wounded in the attack, according to his brother.

nodes.description: 本周累计北约士兵死亡人数超过20人
nodes.support_text: More than 20 Nato soldiers have died this week.

nodes.description: 坎大哈被明确列为北约下一步军事打击重点区域
nodes.support_text: Kandahar is set to be the next focus of Nato's military drive against the Taliban.

Last week... On Monday, Nato's International Security Assistance Force (Isaf) lost 10 soldiers... More than 20 Nato soldiers have died this week.
In earlier violence on Wednesday, four American Nato soldiers were killed when their helicopter was shot down in neighbouring Helmand province.
